<rule id="springboot-webmvc-to-quarkus-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <javaclass references="org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller">
                    <location>ANNOTATION</location>
                </javaclass>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="13" title="Spring MVC is not supported by Quarkus">
                    <message>
                        Spring MVC is not supported by Quarkus

                        Use the following link to figure out the supported Spring Web functionalities.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/spring-web#supported-spring-web-functionalities" title="Quarkus - Supported Spring Web functionalities"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
